page.title: 04INDUSTRY-ORGREAVE
page.content: Around Orgreave there is no housing in the km square, instead there is an industrial estate covering nearly the whole square. The companies range from soft drinks manufacturers to mining equipment supplies. Some businesses have closed down,but some are still going. The businesses are as follows:{ {TRANSPORT FOOD & DRINK BRS Rental Barr Soft Drinks Jardine Air Cargo Asda Superstore Moss Sports Cars Peak Farms Pork Iveco Trucks Pies Philips Trucks ACS Catering Findus Foods {MACHINERY Pit Craft Summit Mining
